text: Robert Lee Fisher (born March 17, 1958) is a former American football tight end. He played for the Chicago Bears from 1980-1981. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Pasadena, California Category:American football tight ends Category:SMU Mustangs football players Category:Chicago Bears players Category:Chicago Blitz players
title: Bob Fisher (tight end)
